description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and responsive design of a frontend application, managing both light and dark themes with CSS variables.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styled with theme colors and responsive design.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo container with animation based on user preference for reduced motion.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section for the application, styled to support flexbox layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styled link element utilizing theme colors for text.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button element for toggling between light and dark themes, with hover and active states.
